name: Exquisite Fishing
description:
Exquisite Fishing is a casual fishing game. In this adventure, you'll need to improve your fishing to its best to be able to catch every single creature in the ocean! Be careful of the depths, because you'll find some amazing creatures waiting for you there.
Throw your lure, catch all the fish you can and sell them for the most you can. Upgrade your gear and reach the bottom of unexplored seas to uncover new creatures!
This game aims to make you relax and enjoy life, with many hentai animations and casual challenges.

  • -Nudity or sexual content
  • -All scenes within the game are consensual
  • -Various different sea biomes
  • -A bunch of unique H-animations
  • -An amazing shop
  • -Not suitable for watching at work
  • -Not suitable for all ages
  • -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
